level.heading: Confirmatory acts.
level.text: Nothing in this title shall be deemed to affect the authority of a personal representative to perform ministerial or confirmatory acts after an estate is closed or the appointment of the personal representative is terminated.

level.heading: Legislative history of Law 3-72
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 3-72, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 20-1301.
